item.title: AO Archive: Unit Testing Phoenix Controllers with Mox
item.description: https://spin.atomicobject.com/2017/12/27/elixir-mox-introduction/ This was one of the first blog posts I wrote while working at Atomic Object. I never got to use Elixir on any projects there, but I still love the language for side projects.
